data.title: Undergraduate Faculty < University of Arkansas
data.meta_description: An alphabetical listing of faculty at the University of Arkansas.
data.text:
Faculty and instructional staff are listed in alphabetical order. The first date after the listing of each name indicates the year of first appointment at the University of Arkansas; the second date indicates the year of appointment to present faculty rank. Where they coincide, only one date is given.
